title: The Heather-Moon
author: Williamson, C. N. (Charles Norris)
snippet: Still wewere in Burns's country, for by Craigie Burn lived Jean Lorimer, to whomhe wrote love-songs; and a little farther on was the scene where "Williebrewed a peck o' maut."
